category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MPP_DefaultCandidateSearchCriteria
preference.preference_description: Specifies a default list of properties used to determine candidates containing broken links that need to be repaired. Candidates are those for which the values of the specified properties match the values of the broken link's properties. Valid Values: logical - Specifies whether the match is mandatory or optional, meaning that at least one of the optional property values must match. Valid values are Mandatory or Optional. property - Specifies any BOM line property.
